content.raw:
I was expecting the examples to be "rebuilt" if they were modified, but I have to delete the build folder to make that happen on xenial. Is this expected?

I ran `make` then `make test` and the tests say they passed. Next I added `ign_find_package(does_not_exist REQUIRED)` to `examples/ign_configure_build/CMakeLists.txt`. `make` and `make test` again still showed passing tests. It wasn't until I deleted the build folder and ran `make` that it failed to configure because of the missing package.
content.html:
I was expecting the examples to be "rebuilt" if they were modified, but I have to delete the build folder to make that happen on xenial. Is this expected?

I ran make then make test and the tests say they passed. Next I added ign_find_package(does_not_exist REQUIRED) to examples/ign_configure_build/CMakeLists.txt. make and make test again still showed passing tests. It wasn't until I deleted the build folder and ran make that it failed to configure because of the missing package.
